title: Edit the title in 'For Sale' ads

posts.content:
Trying to buy a 50 year old vehicle is a time consuming process which is made worse by sellers that don't edit the title of their ad once the vehicle is sold.
I've just read another 3 page thread and the last entry says 'now sold' another 20 minutes of my life I won't get back FFS!!

I agree it's so depressing.
Tony C

author.location: Deepest Darkest London ! (Harrow to be Precise)

posts.content: Stop moaning, you read the 1st post then skip to the last post. If it's still for sale you can read the other 3 pages, hurry tho as it might be sold before you get to the end ............

I've just read another 3 page thread and the last entry says 'now sold' another 20 minutes of my life I won't get back FFS!!
yep couldn't agree more
